And as an added feature, the driver's head is protected in the likely event the car flips over. It's also got a hood!

Craft file? Does the aero actually work? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) very cool!

Eeks, I've forgotten to put the craft file, here's the craft file! [https://www./?8nv9qy67ij879x5](https://www./?8nv9qy67ij879x5)

I had several Formula Kerbals previous versions past, and downforce seemed to work. When I removed the ailerons the craft flips at top speed back in 0.90.

[EDIT] The real craft file is here! The FK-Plaen is just a flying version of it.
